-%0A    %0Aclass Lapiseira:%0A    def __init__(self, calibre: float):%0A        self.calibre = calibre%0A        self.bico = None%0A        self.tambor = %5B%5D%0A%0A    def inserir(self, grafite: Grafite):%0A        if grafite.calibre != self.calibre:%0A            print(%22fail: calibre incompat%C3%ADvel%22)%0A            return%0A        self.tambor.append(grafite)%0A%0A    def puxar(self):%0A        if self.bico is not None:%0A            print(%22fail: j%C3%A1 existe grafite no bico%22)%0A            return%0A        if len(self.tambor) == 0:%0A            print(%22fail: tambor vazio%22)%0A            return%0A        self.bico = self.tambor.pop(0)%0A%0A    def remover(self):%0A        if self.bico is None:%0A            print(%22fail: n%C3%A3o existe grafite no bico%22)%0A            return%0A        self.bico = None%0A%0A    def escrever(self):%0A        if self.bico is None:%0A            print(%22fail: n%C3%A3o existe grafite no bico%22)%0A            return%0A        %0A        gasto = self.bico.gasto_por_folha()%0A%0A        if self.bico.tamanho %3C=10:%0A            print(%22fail: tamanho insuficiente%22)%0A            return%0A        if self.bico.tamanho - gasto %3C 10:%0A            print(%22fail: folha incompleta%22)%0A            self.bico.tamanho = 10%0A            return%0A        %0A        self.bico.tamanho -= gasto%0A%0A    def mostrar(self):%0A        bico_str = %22%5B%5D%22 if self.bico is None else f%22%5B%7Bself.bico%7D%5D%22%0A        tambor_str = %22%22.join(f%22%5B%7Bg%7D%5D%22 for g in self.tambor)%0A        print(f%22calibre: %7Bself.calibre%7D, bico: %7Bbico_str%7D%22)%0A%0A
